ygData.subject: [eqbards] Song weaving 101
ygData.msgSnippet: Heya guys... I was wondering if you could tell me some very basic strategies on using our songs in groups and solo. I am about to hit level 8 so I dont have a
ygData.messageBody:
Heya guys...
I was wondering if you could tell me some very basic strategies on
using our songs in groups and solo.

I am about to hit level 8 so I dont have a lot of them, however what I do
is start off by singing the str/dex song you get at lev1, then once its
started
I start up my regeneration song, then I start whistling the ancient warsong
(lev 7)

then I keep rotating between em to keep them going, and so far it seems to
work
nicely for me. I will occasionally add in the lev 2 song that makes the
enemy "wince"
but its kind of dangerous and Im never sure if its helping much anyway.

What are some tips I can look forward to using at future levels?


Also, well...I was gonna ask about some weapons...but Ill put it in another
mail to keep this thread pure.

Cerulia
Bard of 7.8 songs, Fennin Ro
